tool_description: Validates and standardizes shipping addresses for domestic and international destinations, ensuring deliverability and compliance with postal standards.

street_address.description: Street address including number and street name

country_code.description: Two-letter ISO country code (e.g., US, CA, GB)

error_messages: Invalid country code: Provide a valid two-letter ISO country code.
Address not found: The provided address cannot be validated or standardized.
Incomplete address: Street address and city are required for validation.
Undeliverable address: Address exists but is not suitable for shipping delivery.
usage: Provide street_address, city, and country_code. Optionally include postal_code for better accuracy. Returns standardized address components and deliverability status.

is_valid.description: Whether the address is valid and deliverable
